description: Removes one or more tags from one or more on-premises instances.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tag key-value pairs to remove from the on-premises instances. (dict) --- Information about a tag. Key (string) --- The tag's key. Value (string) --- The tag's value.

parameters.name: instanceNames
parameters.description: The names of the on-premises instances from which to remove tags. (string) ---
